at.tugraz.ist.soma.statements

Class Assignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tugraz.ist.soma.statements.Statement
      • at.tugraz.ist.soma.statements.Assignment

  • public class Assignment
extends Statement
    This class represents an assignment.
    An assignment is e.g.
    • a = b;
    • a = b + c;
    but in our case
    • int a;
    • int a = b;
    • int a = b + c;
    is not an assignment. See VariableDeclaration instead.
    Author:
    Stephan Fr√ºhwirt
